elements.text: You just sat down for some lunch and decide to use your laptop while eating. As you're feeding yourself, you spill some of your pasta on your laptop. After you spill, you quickly get a cloth to clean up the mess, and you feel very...

elements.name: Spilling Food on Laptop_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
